header.title: Corbyn blasted: Maureen Lipman launches stinging attack - 'this lot's NOT Labour!'
header.subtitle: ACTRESS Maureen Lipman has revived her much-loved BT character to launch a stinging attack on Jeremy Corbyn.
header.postText: Beattie, famed for her telephone calls to family in the series of television adverts, features in a video warning that the Labour leader has an “an ology” in extremism.', 'In the film she also raises fears that Mr Corbyn’s plan to nationalise the internet will mess up her broadband after she has finally got the hang of video-calls with her grandchildren.', 'Speaking on the phone to friend Nora, the Jewish star tells a friend: “Of course, we were all Labour, everybody voted Labour. I voted Labour all my life.', '“You know what my late husband said? If you’re Jewish, they gave you your Labour Party badge the day after your circumcision. They gave with one hand, they took with the other.', '“But this lot… this lot’s not Labour. They’re not socialists. You know what they are, Nora? They’re extremists, that’s what my Melvyn says, and he’s not often wrong.', '“Then there’s the throwing around of the millions of pounds. Where’s he going to get that from?”', 'The Coronation Street star was renowned in the 1980s and 1990s for the advertisements, including one where she told her grandson that she was proud he had got “an ology” in sociology despite failing his other exams.', 'The video was produced by the Mainstream campaign launched by former Labour MP Ian Austin, who has said he will vote for Boris Johnson to stop Mr Corbyn taking power.', 'He said: “People like Jeremy Corbyn and John McDonnell have spent decades working with and defending all sorts of extremists and in some cases terrorists and antisemites.', '“Under their leadership, Labour has been poisoned by racism, extremism and intolerance. They can’t be trusted to defend our country and they can’t be trusted with our democracy. A government led by them would mean other extreme policies like massive tax rises, alongside daft ideas like giving free broadband to people who can already afford it.”
header.socioLingVar: Nationality - European or anti-Europeans,Age - Youngsters,Social Class - Working class, Ideological and Political Identity - General,Nationality - General,Gender - General

commentThread.commentText: Beattie is bang on the money,this shower are not Labour.

replies.commentText: So will she be voting TORY or is the film just to add to her bank balance ? She is also Jewish so WHY support LIEbour in the first place ?

commentThread.commentText: The Labour Party is controlled by a clique of metropolitan, middle class, wannabe Marxist revolutionaries called Momentum who have nothing in common with traditional labour voters or their values.
Labour want to nationalise everything, including the internet, so they have complete control over everything - and that leads to complete control over us, the people...

Give the British public credit..We all know "The Labour Party" has been hijacked by the Socialist party, Momentum and the Communist party...All good Labour people of the recent past have been cast into the wilderness...

We have enough free loaders in this country and do mot need to entice more. If Labour got elected, we will have masduve immigtation of freeloaders and our younger working generation will be screwed. Tories is the lesser poison as far as political parties go.

I am working class - my dad was a shop steward - we never dreamed of voting Tory  - Labour was our safe zone - as it were - far to  the left were the militant socialists and Marxists with elastoplast on their glasses' wings - there were not 'us'. Now the militants have wormed their way centre-stage and it starting to look as though it's gonna be necessary to vote Conservative through grtted teeth to keep us from being North Korea mk,2. :

replies.commentText: about sums it up for me as well. over 20 years a paid up member. not anymore ...
You won't regret it... History will show you that Labour always leaves the nation in a worse state than how they found it.

commentThread.commentText: Maureen Lipman CBE is absolutely correct. Labour are a slur against humanity.

replies.commentText: Yup! Socialism = fascism Let 's be honest.

commentThread.commentText: This is brilliant, I haven't laughed so much for a while, she as summed up what a lot of people think of the labour motley crew!

Labour stopped being Labour virtually soon after we joined the then EEC. In doing so, they and the trade unions began neglecting the working class and the indigenous population in favour of minorities and of course the Globalists who are the creators of the then EEC and now the EU. The same can be said for all our mainstream parties, which this includes the toxic Tories who are definitely not Conservatives, because if they were, they would have stopped our children from being groomed into Marxism in our schools and universities

replies.commentText: The left have been infiltrating schools and universities for ever. Blair stepped up the process and unfortunately Cameron with LibDems was also a disciple of Blair so did little to stop it. We have not had a proper conservative party since Thatcher and the next hoped for Tory government will still be pink. Our education system be revamped so that our youngsters are taught British history, no platforming and safe spaces outed and free speech means a person has every right to be offended as happens in the real world.

commentThread.commentText: Beattie needs to be aired on mainstream television, telling it like it is goes a long way.
see Lilly Allen can comment but not us!! WHY?
Surely this country must be tired of labour ruining it and the con party getting it back on its feet.only to be blamed for being tough,time to get rid of labour once and for all.
This is the tip of the iceberg they will not have declared most of what they are going to do.
Another staunch labour supporter gives warnings Will those who intend to vote for them take heed and come to their senses at the dangers that lie beneath the surface The chances are many will not
She's so right this Labour lot are Marxists and communists John Smith will be turning in his grave
most of the people in my local labour clubs want to see a proper socialist opposition with principled MPs. NOT more new labour.
Sooooo.... if Labour were being kinder to the Jewish population everything would still be rosy in the garden then? Dear oh dear.

replies.commentText: Thought labour were the party of the many,seems not.
Ha-ha ... correct. Extreme Jewishness is as bad as anti-Semitism. we can do without them both.

commentThread.commentText: Unfortunately Maureen, they are.
The Marx brothers are toast and they know it. Happy days.

She may be right or she  may be wrong - but I'm very wary of well-heeled actors and performers trying to influence my opinions. They are not political gurus and should please shut up and concentrate on their professional activities... in my opinion!

replies.commentText: There is a difference  She used to annoy me intensley with her left wing views Preaching from a postion of comfort She is now giving stern warnings
lets face it, at least her SHE is right!

commentThread.commentText: Wasn’t she the woman who said that if we got Brexit she would leave the country?

replies.commentText: Dont know if she said that but I DO know we haven't got Brexit .

commentThread.commentText: The 'much loved' lady who turns up on your doorstep and says it's ok for me to use your phone - I've got a card !!
